name: Magical Duelist Lírio and the Bound of Love.
name_original: Magical Duelist Lírio and the Bound of Love.
description:
- It's recomended to play this game on fullscreen. -
A lonelly girl is sitting somewhere in the city, lost in her own miserable thoughts and worries. BUT NOT FOR LONG! Cause Magical Duelist Lírio is on the scene!
